remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為新的值，就會中斷任何先前繫結的 WMI 類別。When the property is set to a new value, the will be disconnected from any previously-bound WMI class. 重新連接到新的 WMI 類別路徑。Reconnect to the new WMI class path. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化變數建構函式，然後取得 WMI 類別中的所有方法都傳遞至建構函式。The following example shows how to initialize a variable with a constructor and then get all the methods in the WMI class passed into the constructor.
